5c00f992-5066-42f2-88d7-566b8b9104b5.Statement: On average cohort 1 participants in the primary trial had an increased Rate of Acute Toxicity , whereas those in cohort 2  did not experience any Acute Toxicities.

96f41881-6ba5-4688-8471-9462fc727919.Statement: On average cohort 1 participants in the primary trial had an increased Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density, whereas those in cohort 2 lost mineral density.

052ee533-7daa-4cbf-a64c-bc9a50444173.Statement: the primary trial does not monitor the occurrence of Hemoglobin C Disease in its adverse events.

bda2752e-082e-4d06-926a-04ade3f61c26.Statement: 11 patients in the primary trial suffer from a liver disease, 0 in the secondary trial.

7bb88699-1536-4fdc-9cb2-c5ef350d559b.Statement: trastuzumab was used for the interventions in the primary trial and the secondary trial.
7bb88699-1536-4fdc-9cb2-c5ef350d559b.Label: Entailment

006f6b4e-6245-4f09-9786-327bbed3d766.Statement: The Percentage of Participants With Feasibility was 10% higher in cohort 1 of the primary trial than in cohort 2.
006f6b4e-6245-4f09-9786-327bbed3d766.Label: Entailment

f697c2d8-e0dd-476e-8ff4-dffe053076f8.Statement: The Trastuzumab arm of the primary trial reported a pCR rate of 54%, significantly worse results than the Lapatinib arm which achieved a pCR rate of 45%.

d23eb56e-c232-4754-94aa-903bc174cb35.Label: Entailment
